content.text: I'll help you schedule both the file writing implementation task and the Asianometry video! Let me check your calendar and find the optimal slots for both.

input.query: I need to schedule a 4-6 hour coding task (implementing file writing tool for Charon project) in the user's calendar. Can you find the best available time slots and schedule this development work? Also need to schedule watching an Asianometry video (17-28 minutes) for relaxation afterward.
